llm_res.rule: The function name() should return the name of the token.
The function balanceOf(address _owner) should return the account balance of another account with address _owner.
Transfers of 0 values MUST be treated as normal transfers and fire the Transfer event.

llm_res:
YES

The function `balanceOf` in the provided code violates the ERC-20 standard rule that requires it to return "the account balance of the account with address _owner". Instead of returning the actual balance from the `_balances` mapping, the function adds 709 to the balance of any account queried. This modification does not accurately reflect the true balance of the account, thus violating the ERC-20 standard requirement.
